channel.title: Help me (mod read for first part)
channel.description:
someone sned me this in pm
[quote="nikkidespard"][b]You have been issued With a Warning![/b]
Hello Moparscaper ,
You have been given a official warning off moparscape Staff for the following Reason:
Swearing Cursing Racism Banning a Moparscape member of staff from you're server once being threatned with a Warning.
[b]A complaint was made also by the follow member of staff:[/b] NikkiDespard
[quote]He was very abusive and not listning to anything i said.[/quote]
[shadow=red,left]IF[/shadow]
You do not proceed to this warning ,
And carry on with you're behavior with other server users &/or Staff. You will be banned permenantly from moparscape forums and our server status page.
A message has been sent by The / a Team of moparscape staff and says:
[quote]Do you know what i can do now ? Ass hole.[/quote]
Thank you for you're time.
MoparScape User Moderation Team.[/quote] is this allowed?
EDIT: i need help with an error my msn is gameoproduct@hotmail.com
error: client.java:36134: class, interface, or enum expected import java.util.ArrayList; ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully!

item.title: Help me (mod read for first part)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Made me laugh, but he’s been warned now, well, moderated. Pm me if he hassles you any further.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me (mod read for first part)

item.title: Help me (mod read for first part)
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

This is my warning I got months ago.

I removed what I was warned for, old drama doesn’t need to be talked about. That’s what one looks like though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me (mod read for first part)
item.dc:creator: @nietmeer nietmeer
item.description:
@nietmeer wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:4, topic:374460”][quote author=nietmeer link=topic=470435.msg3439782#msg3439782 date=1293008517]

Rofl. Just go to your pm and click report.

but is this allowed? ( she’s and junior member and she used offensive language on my server and thats not allowed.)

and u know how to fix my error?
[/quote]
What? A Junior Member issued you a warning because of rule-breaking on MoparScape forums or because of rule-breaking on a server?[/quote]
dude. i warned her sometimes to use not so much offensive language on my server and she didnt listen so i banned her she did again i ipbanned her…

Read full topic
item.source: Help me (mod read for first part)

[/quote]

but is this allowed? ( she’s and junior member and she used offensive language on my server and thats not allowed.)

[quote=“nikkidespard”]You have been issued With a Warning!

Hello Moparscaper ,

You have been given a official warning off moparscape Staff for the following Reason:

Swearing
Cursing
Racism
Banning a Moparscape member of staff from you’re server once being threatned with a Warning.

A complaint was made also by the follow member of staff: NikkiDespard

He was very abusive and not listning to anything i said.

And carry on with you’re behavior with other server users &/or Staff.
You will be banned permenantly from moparscape forums and our server status page.

A message has been sent by The / a Team of moparscape staff and says:

Do you know what i can do now ? Ass hole.

MoparScape User Moderation Team.[/quote] is this allowed?
